analysis.summary: The 'day' field is a date type field requiring day-of-month input, likely part of a date collection system for September 2025
insights: Field type is 'date' based on the date_required context
The field specifically captures the day component of a date
Given September 2025 context, valid range is 1-30
This appears to be part of a date validation system
recommendations: Implement validation for range 1-30 (September has 30 days)
Use numeric input with leading zero support (01-30)
Add calendar picker UI for better user experience
Set as high priority field since dates are typically critical for document processing
Consider grouping with month/year fields if they exist
